title: RT News - October 12, 2019 (12:00 MSK)
text: Turkey vows to push on with its assault against the Kurds in northern Syria despite international outrage over the operation. As Ankara's offensive gains momentum, some in the US seem unsure whether the Kurdish forces are allies or not. Also to come: a journalist accuses his former network NBC of trying to impede his Pulitzer-prize winning expose of Harvey Weinstein's alleged sexual abuses. He also names Hillary Clinton among those standing in the way. Violent unrest in Ecuador's capital over austerity measures enters its 10th consecutive day with indigenous protesters rejecting the government's offer to talk.
description: Turkey vows to push on with its assault against the Kurds in northern Syria despite international outrage over the operation
